item.title: Manhole banging !, 8th October
item.description:
We live above the roundabout in Evelyn street, that roundabout is in the Main Street and you can recognize it cause it’s nearby Coral (bet shop) and before the square with post offices and Londis ( if you come from Greenwich). We have a manhole banging and it’s been there since ages, now it’s even louder and it’s disrupting our sleep pattern. I would really appreciate if someone can come and fix it.. thank you so much
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Evelyn Street, New Cross, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Several lime and forest bikes blocking pavement, 8th October
item.description:
Hi there, is it possible to restrict parking of electric bikes on the corner of wilson street / sun street, as it is constantly blocking the pavement and making issues for pedestrians. It's impossible for wheelchair users at the moment. Thank you.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Wilson Street, Hackney, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 192,194,196,198,200, Manor Place, Elephant and Castle, London

item.title: Flyposter on lamp post in Hawthorne Road junction of Blackbrook Lane, 8th October
item.description:
Platinum drives and patios Flyposter on lamp post. Please will you fine this company for littering our streets with their Flyposter junk. I’m sharing a what3words address to help you find this specific location. Tap to see exactly where it is: ///onion.farmer.newest https://w3w.co/onion.farmer.newest

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hawthorne Road, Bickley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping of fridge/freezer on Cheshunt Road, 8th October
item.description:
Fridge freezer has been fly tipped, was originally in the road on 7th Oct, has now been moved to pavement so may cause issues for pushchair/wheelchair users

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Cheshunt Road, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: New Road markings going to cause an accident, 8th October
item.description:
The entrance to the roundabout from the A2016 has recently been repainted, this is great as the old markings were unreadable However, it is now causing more confusion as all 3 lanes can go straight ahead, but it is a 2 lane roundabout that leads to a 2 lane road With three possible exits, the first being a single lane, I believe the left lane should be left turn only, middle and right can go straight and right to the third exit Currently many motorists are entering the roundabout and it is impossible to predict their movements as many use the left lane to the third exit, impeding those going straight from the centre

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lower Belvedere, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.description:
Needs cutting back

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Kendall Avenue, Elmers End, London
